channel.title: Changin drops and npc hp [667]
channel.description:
hello. i am messing around with the matrix source a bit. and i was wondering how to change the drops and the hp of the npc. in the matrix source are packed files, but i don't know how to change them, because there is no unpacked file...
i hope some'one could help me... greetz, Monkey-G! :)

item.title: Changin drops and npc hp [667]
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

To change the NPC drops and their HP, you must unpack combatDefinitions and and the drops. You can achieve this by making some classes in the net folder in your server to pack and unpack the files in to well, unpacked files.

Sorry if you don’t know how to do this. Mess around with it a little, maybe you can manage. Look at how the packs and unpacks the shops, you’ll get the idea.

Read full topic
